metaTags.metaTitle: Powerful application security from the Cloudflare edge
metaTags.metaDescription: Deliver superior experiences through faster performance and world-class application security, all on an integrated and easy-to-use platform.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: Protect your website from attacks
relatedBlades.copy: Ensure uninterrupted availability, guard sensitive data, and preserve user trust for your business-critical web applications.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: In Q1 2024, Cloudflare blocked an average of 209 billion cyber threats each day

relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare protects millions of Internet properties

Here are some you might recognize

relatedBlades.title: Financial and reputational damage from cyber attacks are a constant risk
relatedBlades.copy: Protect your applications and APIs from malicious traffic to keep your business online and reduce operating costs.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of Cloudflare logo on a shield

features.description: 30% of traffic Cloudflare sees on the Internet is bot-related.
In February 2023, Cloudflare detected and mitigated the largest HTTPS DDoS attack on record, a 71 million request-per-second DDoS attack.
There are billions of stolen credentials on the dark web to fuel credential stuffing that leads to account takeover.

contentfulAsset.description: Prevent financial and identity theft icon

relatedBlades.title: Why should you sign up for a Cloudflare Pro or Business plan?
relatedBlades.subtitle: See the Cloudflare Difference

features.title: Global security for peace of mind
features.description: Cloudflare's global network has a capacity of over 197 Tbps and spans more than 285 cities in 100 countries. Our network stops attacks at the source where they are launched.

features.title: Precise, data-driven security
features.description: The Cloudflare network reach provides unmatched visibility into threats, informing our machine learning models to provide the most up to date protection with low false positives.

features.title: Easy deployment
features.description: Cloudflare builds products that are simple to configure and deploy. Reduce overhead to manage your site's security and hit the ground running.

contentfulAsset.description: Illustration of a shield, lock, and password

relatedBlades.copy: Gain a modern application security posture with immediate protection against security threats including:
relatedBlades.title: Get instant protection with Cloudflare's web application firewall (WAF) and bot mitigation
relatedBlades.subtitle: Included with the Pro or Business plan

keyFeature: Magecart-style attacks / browser supply chain attacks

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Pro and Business plans include:
relatedBlades.subtitle: FEATURED SECURITY SOLUTIONS

features.title: Web Application Firewall
features.description: Protect your website against security threats, such as zero-day vulnerabilities, OWASP top-10 attack techniques, and use of compromised or stolen credentials with Cloudflare's Managed Rulesets.

features.title: Security Center
features.description: Cloudflare Security Center offers attack surface management (ASM) that inventories IT assets, enumerates potential security issues, controls phishing and spoofing risks, and enables security teams to investigate and mitigate threats in a few clicks.

features.title: Page Shield
features.description: Cloudflare Page Shield protects your visitors from Magecart-style supply chain attacks that steal credit card information and sensitive data through malicious third-party dependencies.

features.title: Unmetered DDoS Protection
features.description: Cloudflare's unmetered mitigation of DDoS protects Internet applications and APIs from volumetric attack, ensuring fast performance and high availability.

features.title: Bot Management
features.description: Protect against bot attacks with Super Bot Fight Mode. Block or challenge automated traffic and access real-time analytics to better understand bot activity.

features.title: Rate Limiting
features.description: Guards against denial-of-service attacks, brute-force password attempts, and other types of abusive behavior targeting the application layer.

contentfulAsset.description: Prevent financial and identity theft icon

relatedBlades.title: Compare Cloudflare plans for securing websites and applications

addOns.entryTitle: PAYGO - Security LP - Add Ons - Free Plan - Element
addOns.title: Free plan

content.value: The basics you need to protect and accelerate your site.
Block AI Bots from scraping your site
Protect against the most severe vulnerabilities using
Cloudflare Free Managed Ruleset
Stop illegitimate traffic with unmetered DDos protection
Guard all of your content including text, images and email addresses from web scrapers with Cloudflare's ScrapeShield™ service
Challenge easy-to-detect bad bots from popular cloud providers

addOns.entryTitle: PAYGO - Security LP - Add Ons - Pro Plan - Element
addOns.title: Pro plan

content.value: For professional websites, high traffic blogs, and applications requiring more security and performance features to keep growing.
Protect against zero-day and common attacks including OWASP vulnerabilities with WAF
Detect stolen and exposed credentials
Identify and challenge easy-to-detect bots from any source
Increase speed by auto reducing image sizes
Prioritize loading of key site assets
Optimize the content served by the Cloudflare CDN by using cache analytics
Plus, everything in Free

addOns.entryTitle: PAYGO - Security LP - Add Ons - Biz Plan Element
addOns.title: Business plan

content.value: For business-critical websites and applications that require advanced security, performance, and support features.
Protect against unknown application vulnerabilities with WAF
Detect 3rd-party scripts on web apps and receive alerts with Page Shield
Detect and challenge sophisticated bots with highly variable traffic using machine learning
Built in PCI and SOC 2 Type II compliance
Guaranteed uptime with 100% service level agreement (SLA)
Chat and ticket support
Plus, everything in Pro

relatedBlades.title: Security, Performance, and Reliability - all in one package
